title: Cannot connect to game on NA server.
body:
I added 5 people in the game and they can't connect either. The game is apparently stuck in limbo.
I went on my smurf and tried a custom game in there, everything worked fine. 
But when I logged back on my main, it says unable to connect to server. 
2 people on my team and the enemy team says they cannot connect either.
HELP!

replies.body: Hmmmm that's a little strange. So it sounds like the game started, but for some reason nobody is able to connect to that game server whatsoever. I want to make sure we cover all our bases, and we should start by double checking your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for anything that might have been changed. Hit me back and let me know if that helps!
